word[0]: I'm a Celebrity ... Get me Out of Here!
definition[0]: a reality TV show, shown in many countries, in which celebrities (celebrity) live in the jungle for a period of time. The viewers vote to say which celebrity should do a physical test often involving jungle animals. By successfully doing a test, a celebrity can win food for the camp. If, however, a celebrity wants to stop a test, he or she must shout “I’m a celebrity. Get me out of here!” Viewers also vote to say who they would like to win the show. The presenters of the British show are Ant and Dec.
